books.author: by Rebecca Yarros
books.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.
books.name: FOURTH WING

books.author: by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child
books.description: The fourth book in the Nora Kelly series. Kelly and Swanson search for the ninth victim of a gruesome and bizarre incident that occurred in 2008.
books.name: DEAD MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: Three daughters, who return to their family orchard in the spring of 2020, learn about their mother’s relationship with a famous actor.
books.name: TOM LAKE

books.author: by Karin Slaughter
books.description: The 11th book in the Will Trent series. Trent’s investigation of a young woman’s assault reveals a link to an attack 15 years ago.
books.name: AFTER THAT NIGHT

books.author: by Freida McFadden
books.description: Troubles surface when a woman looking to make a fresh start takes a job in the home of the Winchesters.
books.name: THE HOUSEMAID

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Dangers develop when a drug trafficker becomes obsessed with a woman who has a mutual attraction to a D.E.A. agent.
books.name: TOO LATE

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: The eighth book in the Shadow Riders series. Geno connects to Amaranthe in the shadows and goes after his parents’ killer.
books.name: SHADOW DANCE

books.author: by Bonnie Garmus
books.description: A scientist and single mother living in California in the 1960s becomes a star on a TV cooking show.
books.name: LESSONS IN CHEMISTRY

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Casey McQuiston
books.description: A staged friendship between the son of the president and his rival, the Prince of Wales, evolves into a secret and potentially dangerous romance.
books.name: RED, WHITE AND ROYAL BLUE

books.author: by Abraham Verghese
books.description: Three generations of a family living on South India’s Malabar Coast suffer the loss of a family member by drowning.
books.name: THE COVENANT OF WATER

books.author: by Hanya Yanagihara
books.description: Four college friends, one with a traumatic past, move to New York seeking fame and fortune.
books.name: A LITTLE LIFE

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: In the sequel to “It Ends With Us,” Lily deals with her jealous ex-husband as she reconnects with her first boyfriend.
books.name: IT STARTS WITH US

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.
books.name: VERITY
